amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt the California Coastal Ranges Biosphere Reserve from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of September 25, 1997 to exempt the California Coastal Ranges Biosphere Reserve from the provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 226 (Roll no. 501).
